name: JouleSousVidebyChefSteps
0:
”Alexa, ask jewel to set the temperature to 140 degrees Fahrenheit.”
”Alexa, ask jewel for a status update.”
”Alexa, ask jewel to cook steak.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: jewel
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Love sous vide? Use this skill to discover time-and-temperature settings for all your favorite foods. If you have Joule, you can cook totally hands-free with the smartest sous vide tool on the market. Simply link your account and say “Alexa, ask Joule to cook a steak” or “Alexa, ask Joule to cook a chicken breast,” then talk your way into meat cooked exactly the way you like it—Alexa will set Joule to the right temperature automatically!

Recommended:
- Joule, the sous vide tool from ChefSteps
- the Joule app (available for free at the Apple App Store, Google Play, and Amazon Appstore)
- a ChefSteps account

Once the skill is enabled and you have linked your Joule account, try saying “Alexa, ask Joule to cook a steak.”

You can also ask Alexa things like:
- Alexa, ask Joule to cook steak.
- Alexa, ask Joule, to cook chicken breast.
- Alexa, ask Joule to set the temperature.
- Alexa, ask Joule to set the temperature to 130 degrees.
- Alexa, ask Joule to check the status.
